visual_style: Theatrical stage performance style, filmed with real performers on stage in a controlled environment. Strong spotlighting, dramatic shadows, and visible stage elements such as curtains, props, and set design. Actors wear detailed costumes and makeup, performing expressive gestures and exaggerated body language suited for live theater. Camera angles capture both wide shots of the stage and close-ups of performers, highlighting emotion and drama. Color grading is natural with theatrical lighting hues (warm tungsten, deep blues, intense reds). Atmosphere resembles live drama, opera, or musical stage shows. Aspect ratio 16:9 full frame, no top or bottom borders, no black bars. NOT CGI, NOT animated, NOT cartoon, NOT stylized, NOT 3D, NOT render.
